page.title: 11THE CUMBERLAND SHOW
page.content: The Cumberland show is held every year in Carlisle on or near the 18th of July.It is the biggest one -day agricultural show in the north and farmers and others interested in everything connected with farming and the country life in general look for ward to it each year. Not only are there livestock judging classes for everything from goats to guinea pigs and cats to Clydesdales but there are many exhibitions,side shows,displays of country crafts and produce and numerous marquees -in all of these there will be farming folk and Townies discussing the many important aspects of agriculture. The average attendance for the show is around 23000,although it has reached much higher than this on some occasions.
